pullRequest.title: CAMEL-15319: Add 'watchUpdates' consumer to camel-jira
pullRequest.bodyText: Add consumer to watch updates in issues defined by jql. Thanks to this it's possible to trigger other actions in camel integration based on status change, component change etc.

nodes.bodyText: Can you please fix this? It's better to import only the needed bits.

commit.message:
CAMEL-JIRA: Add consumer to watch updates in issues defined by jql.
Add tests for the new consumer.
CAMEL-JIRA: Update the documentation to include watchUpdates consumer.
